pr_title: fix: allow dynamic construction of an ARRAY of STRUCTS with duplicate values #5436

timeline.author: agavra

timeline.bodyText: I think we should flip the semantics of the if statement here and instead return early if the structToSchemaName already contains the entry - that way we wont be incrementing structSchemaCount or adding the unnecessary argument to the argumentBuilder.
timeline.author: agavra

timeline.bodyText: let's move the if branch one line up (to make sure that we don't unnecessarily increment structSchemaCount)
timeline.author: agavra
